main event: A bright, flat object glowing green in the center with a reddish-orange outer edge was observed in the sky over Dayton, Ohio on June 20, 1960.
interesting points: The object flashed colors a few times before disappearing.
The witnesses estimated the object was about the size of a quarter held at arm's length.
The object was at an altitude of approximately 5,000 feet and moved in a straight line at a rapid speed.
The sighting lasted for around 30 seconds.
The weather conditions were clear at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: a bright, flat object glowing green in the center with a reddish-orange outer edge
